sentences.english: Will this new program attract skilled personnel to our company?
sentences.chinese: 這個新項目將能吸引有技術的全體人員到我們共司敬？

sentences.english: If the fire-alarm goes, staff should assemble outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 火警警報響時全體人員應到樓外集合。

sentences.english: But he said no one at the dinner was ever in danger.
sentences.chinese: 不過，他表示晚宴全體人員人身安全均未受到威脅。

sentences.english: Modern Family won for overall cast performance in a TV comedy.
sentences.chinese: 《摩登家庭》的全體人員獲得了最佳喜劇表演獎。

sentences.english: The general issued an order to capture the hill to all personnel.
sentences.chinese: 將軍向全體人員下達佔領那座山的命令。

sentences.english: If the fire-alarm goes, staff should assemble outside building.
sentences.chinese: 火景警報響時全體人員纓到樓外集合。

sentences.english: All personnel working for SECCO project are governed by this procedure.
sentences.chinese: 參與賽科項目建設的全體人員均受本條例的約束。

sentences.english: After the opening ceremony and all staff visit a memorial, to pay homage dead miners.
sentences.chinese: 揭牌儀式後，全體人員參觀紀念館，憑弔死難礦工。

sentences.english: Every person from the team was invited to have a great dinner by this Scottish family.
sentences.chinese: 熱情好客的蘇格蘭人在家中盛情款待我隊全體人員。

definition: out with the old and in with the new (idiom)
Central Commission for Discipline Inspection (CCDI), organization within the CCP which investigates corruption and other wrongdoing among Party cadres/abbr. for 中共中央紀律檢查委員會|中共中央纪律检查委员会
Hong Kong Federation of Trade Unions
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Gong1 hui4 Lian2 he2 hui4

definition: organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
to review a judicial case/to reexamine
Shaoguan prefecture level city in Guangdong province
